title: Governance of artificial intelligence: A risk and guideline-based integrative framework
research_description: The article provides an integrative AI governance framework based on a risk and guideline approach. It covers various dimensions, including social, economic, ethical, and legal considerations, aimed at managing the risks associated with AI in public administration.
research_results: The study highlights the need for a comprehensive AI governance framework that integrates all relevant stakeholders, including governments, industry, and civil society, to mitigate risks and establish robust guidelines.
future_research: Future research should explore the empirical validation of the proposed framework and its adaptation to specific public sectors.
